thread.title: LGO energy up on production testing report
thread.title_full: LGO energy up on production testing report

title: LGO energy up on production testing report
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 20, 2015, 12:23 BST - UK Markets close in 4 hrs 7 mins LGO energy up on production testing report By Frank Prenesti | Sharecast – 8 minutes ago 1.4833 -0.0167 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Shares (Berlin: DI6.BE - news ) in LGO Energy (LSE: LGO.L - news ) rose 3.3% on Thursday as the company said production testing at its Goudron field in Trinidad delivered an oil flow rate of about 325 barrels per day. The testing took pace at well GY-675, the first well drilled on Pad-5 in Goudron. "The well is now undergoing a series of production tests in line with the company's policy on data gathering from new wells," the company said. 
LGO shares were up 0.05p at 1.55p at 1029 BST. Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
